New Records: Austria won their second consecutive Nations League win after a seven-game unbeaten run in the competition previously
Key Match Events: Marko Arnautovic scored a penalty after a foul was committed by Andreas Hanche-Olsen
Philipp Lienhart scored his second goal in as many matches in this international break
Stefan Posch headed home from Marcel Sabitzer's cross
Michael Gregoritsch scored after coming off the bench
Pre-Game Insights: Norway talisman Erling Haaland was wearing the captain’s armband in the absence of Martin Odegaard
Post-Match Reflections: Ralf Rangnick’s men responded after the break, showing considerably more spark than the floodlights which temporarily failed and plunged the stadium into darkness
Norway tasted defeat for the first time in five matches they’ve played without captain and creator-in-chief Odegaard
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was delayed due to floodlights failure
Austria drew level on points with Norway at the top of UEFA Nations League Group B3
